allPost.title: Creating video from text
allPost.excerpt: Sora can generate videos up to a minute long while maintaining visual quality and adherence to the user’s prompt.
allPost.content:
Sora is an AI model that can create realistic and imaginative scenes from text instructions.
 
 Today, Sora is becoming available to red teamers to assess critical areas for harms or risks.
  
 We are also granting access to a number of visual artists, designers, and filmmakers to gain feedback on how to advance the model to be most helpful for creative professionals.
 
 We’re sharing our research progress early to start working with and getting feedback from people outside of OpenAI and to give the public a sense of what AI capabilities are on the horizon.
 
 ## Safety
 
  We’ll be taking several important safety steps ahead of making Sora available in OpenAI’s products.

allPost.title: Open AI Chat GPT
allPost.excerpt: ChatGPT (Chat Generative Pre-trained Transformer) is a chatbot developed by OpenAI and launched on November 30, 2022.
allPost.content:
• Model Description: Large-scale language model capable of generating human-like text.
       •	Model Category: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
       •	Model Developer/Organization: OpenAI
       •	Model Architecture: Transformer
       •	Key Features: Natural language generation, text completion, language translation.
       •	Performance Metrics: Achieved state-of-the-art performance on various language tasks.
       •	Availability: Proprietary (API access provided by OpenAI)
 
       Wikipedia link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GPT-3
       Open AI’s blog link: https://openai.com/blog/gpt-3-apps

allPost.title: Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers
allPost.excerpt: Pre-trained contextual language representation model developed by Google AI Language Team
allPost.content:
• Model Description: Pre-trained contextual language representation model. 
       •	Model Category: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
       •	Model Developer/Organization: Google AI Language Team
       •	Model Architecture: Transformer
       •	Key Features: Contextual understanding of language, used for tasks like text classification, question answering, and more.
       •	Performance Metrics: State-of-the-art results in various NLP benchmarks.
       •	Availability: Open-source (licensed under Apache License 2.0)

       Wikipedia link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BERT_(language_model)
       Google’s official research blog: http://blog.research.google/2018/11/open-sourcing-bert-state-of-art-pre.html

allPost.title: You Only Look Once
allPost.excerpt: Real-time object detection system developed by Joseph Redmon and Ali Farhadi
allPost.content:
•	Model Description: Real-time object detection system. 
       •	Model Category: Computer Vision
       •	Model Developer/Organization: Joseph Redmon and Ali Farhadi
       •	Model Architecture: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)
       •	Key Features: Fast object detection in real-time video streams.
       •	Performance Metrics: High accuracy and speed compared to traditional object detection systems.
       •	Availability: Open-source (licensed under MIT License)
       v7 labs link: https://www.v7labs.com/blog/yolo-object-detection
       Joseph Redmon official documentation: https://pjreddie.com/yolo/

allPost.title: Residual Neural Network
allPost.excerpt: Deep convolutional neural network architecture developed by Microsoft Research
allPost.content: •	Model Description: Deep convolutional neural network architecture.         •	Model Category: Computer Vision         •	Model Developer/Organization: Microsoft Research         •	Model Architecture: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)         •	Key Features: Very deep network architecture with skip connections to address the vanishing gradient problem.         •	Performance Metrics: Achieved state-of-the-art results in image classification tasks.         •	Availability: Open-source (licensed under MIT License)         Wikipedia link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Residual_neural_network         Microsoft official blog: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/microsoft-vision-model-resnet-50-combines-web-scale-data-and-multi-task-learning-to-achieve-state-of-the-art/

allPost.title: Enhanced Transformer architecture for long-range dependencies
allPost.excerpt: Developed by Google AI Language Team
allPost.content: •	Model Description: Enhanced Transformer architecture for long-range dependencies.         •	Model Category: Natural Language Processing (NLP)         •	Model Developer/Organization: Google AI Language Team         •	Model Architecture: Transformer         •	Key Features: Improved modeling of long-range dependencies in sequences.         •	Performance Metrics: State-of-the-art results in various NLP tasks, especially for longer sequences.         •	Availability: Open-source (licensed under Apache License 2.0)         Github document: https://github.com/kimiyoung/transformer-xl         Google research blog: https://blog.research.google/2019/01/transformer-xl-unleashing-potential-of.html
